name: Sombre
description:
Sombre is a 2 player game where one player controls the character and the other controls the-wisp. This game has no competitiveness or goal. This project was merely a representation of little light in dark times. 

Character Controls - W,A,S,D & SPACE 

Wisp Controls - All 4 Arrow Keys

Credits

Panikos Theodosiou-Project Leader/ Game Design/Level Design

Daisy Savin - Game Art 

Riona Kraithat - Sound Design/Composer

Mohon Miah - Game Programming
